verbose_text: Strikingly, we found that siBLM in Msh2 -I - mESCs caused a further increase in RMD frequency between 1% or 3% divergent repeats at 3.3 kbp and 9.1 kbp (> = 3.1-fold; XREF_FIG).
evidence: siBLM in Msh2 -I-  mESCs caused a further increase in RMD frequency between 1% or 3% divergent repeats at 3.3 kbp and 9.1 kbp
